```
import presentor from 'presentor'

var model = {

  width: '100%',
  height: '100%',

  origin: [10, 10],
  scale: [1.1, 1.1],
  rotation: 0,

  components: [{
    type: 'rect',

    left: 100,
    top: 100,
    width: 200,
    height: 200,

    rotation: Math.PI * 45 / 180,

    class: 'box'
  }]
};

var target = 'presenter';

var style = {
  '.box': {
    backgroundColor: '#FF0000',
    alpha: .5
  }
}

var p1 = presentor.create({ target, model, style });
```
